name: 許益瑞
objective:
固態化學是一門涵蓋物理、化學、與材料的跨領域科學。在此課程，我們將講述如何應用化學的知識與概念來了解固態材料，這包含晶體結構，化學鍵結、繞射、光譜、與熱分析技術。此外，我們也將用物理化學的觀念，來討論固態材料的光、電與磁的特性。
Solid state chemistry is a multidisciplinary filed which covers the physics, chemistry and material science. In this course, we will illustrate how to use chemistry knowledge to approach the solid state materials, which includes the crystal structure, chemical bonding, diffraction techniques, spectroscopy, and thermal analysis. Moreover, the electrical, magnetic and optical properties of solid state materials will also be discussed by the point of view of physical chemistry.
schedule:
1. Introduction to solid state chemistry
2. Basic Crystal Structure description
3. Basic Crystallography
4. Powder X-ray Diffraction
5. X-ray Absorption Spectroscopy
6. Thermal Analysis
7. Electricity
8. Magnetism
scorePolicy: 期中考 40% 期末考 40% 平時 20%
materials: A. R. West, Basic Solid State Chemistry, 2nd Ed.
